name: Into the Dark (itch) (bodhi)
description:
NOTE: Please download for better performance! Unfortunately HTML runs very slow...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It happened in the third Age of Man.

The Sun darkened and released Curses upon the Land.

The Kingdoms of Men united to fight the Demons.

But failed.

The remaining Humans fled into deep Caves, where they live in Fear.

You are our last Hope.

Find a Way to defeat the Darkness!!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

E - Inventory

S - Skills

Enter - Accept

Escape - Abort

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 using Godot 3.2.3. I hope you like it!
